class.source: int max(int x, int y){return(x>y?x:y);}
int max(int a,int b) {return a>b?a:b; }
inline static int imax(int x, int y) { return x>y ? x : y; }
u max(u a,u b){return a>b?a:b;}
int min(int x, int y) {return (x>y?y:x);}
int max( int x, int y ) { return x < y ? y:x; }
int min(int x,int y){return(x>y?y:x);}
int max(int x, int y) {return (x>y?x:y);}
static inline int min(int a, int b) { return a < b ? a : b; }
inline static int imin(int x, int y) { return x<y ? x : y; }
static inline long long min(long long length1, long long length2) { return (length1 < length2) ? length1 : length2; }
static inline long long max(long long length1, long long length2) { return (length1 > length2) ? length1 : length2; }
inline static double fsqr(double x) { return x*x; }
inline static int isqr(int x) { return x*x; }
